Name: Sand Bullet
Description: You flick your finger and shoot a small sand bullet in mid-range, dealing 2d4 points of piercing damage.

Name: Ancestral Faces
Description: A stone shield in the shape of a face levitates around you or an ally in mid-range, penalizing ranged attacks with disadvantage.

Name: Earth Spike
Description: You command the earth to form a spike in mid-range, piercing one target. The spike deals 1d10 bludgeoning damage and 2d4 piercing damage.

Name: Catapult
Description: You extend your arm and perform an arch throw, tossing a rock at mid-range. The rock shatters in pieces upon impact, dealing 3d8 bludgeoning damage to the target.

Name: Rck Hammer
Description: Infuse your arm or a weapon with earth, creating a hard rock exterior that deals an extra 1d8 points of bludgeoning damage.

Name: Spiked Armor
Description: Your skin grows spikes that deal 1d4 sunder damage to enemy weapons.

Name: Grease
Description: You cover a small radius area around you in grease, slowing anyone that enters the terrain. You are not affected by this.
